snippet.title: Graceful Explosion Machine (Gameplay, Nov 2016)
snippet.description:
Coming Early 2017 to PS4 and Steam. More info: http://vertexpop.com/gem

Graceful Explosion Machine places you at the controls of a powerful, yet agile, GEM: an attack ship with multiple weapon systems and precision control. Blast, combo, and dash your way through neon-coloured space baddies using four absurdly overpowered weapons at once.
